name: HemoglobinA1c
title: Hemoglobin A1c
purpose: (Clinical Focus: HbA1c test for Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus),(Data Element Scope: OBSERVATION:),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC codes representing the ratio of hemoglobin A1c to total hemoglobin.),(Exclusion Criteria: LOINC codes with component other than Hemoglobin A1c/Hemoglobin.total)
